channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 9th October
item.description:
Somebody is using this particular portion of ðŸ”‘ Duchy Street on a weekly basis to fly Tip something has to be done by the council to stop this. One of my recommendations would be to actually do some weeding and keep the street looking tidy because that way the Street will look respectful enough that people might possibly not consider it to be a garbage dump. The Council actively does not look after ðŸ”‘ Duchy Street and this is the reason why it has become such a dumping ground for fly tipping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Duchy Street, Waterloo, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Furniture and rubbish left outside, 9th October
item.description:

item.title: Oil on road and drain, 9th October
item.description:
Looks and smells like someone has poured a large amount of cooking oil down the roadside drain. Oil is on the road around it, which is making it sticky and smell. Oil gets on car tyres with whoever parks near it. Drain may be blocked. Parked cars can be moved or area kept clear if notified in advance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairby Road, Horn Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 9th October
item.description:
Resident reported via Customer Service Email: Good evening, I was walking my dog this evening and noticed an e-bike and chair dumped in the duck pond located in Parish Wood/Park. Please see the attached images. This is both an eyesore and a danger to the wildlife. I look forward to this being tidied up promptly. Kind regards.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, West Woodside, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
